page.title: 14 TOURISM - GILLING WEST
page.content: This is an a attractive area for {tourists.}In{Gilling}there are a few holiday cottages and there is a {caravan site}near the top of Gilling bank, which is suitable for{Caravan {Club touring caravans.}It is called {Hargill House Caravan Park.}It was first opened in 1968 and can accommodate{70 caravans.}There are toilet blocks, shower facilities, water taps and a site office where milk, bread and papers can be purchased.From the site you get a beautiful view of the landscape.It is a lovely walk down the hill to the shop or one of the pubs in{Gilling { }Gilling is near the{Dales}and there are lovely walks. It is near the market town of{Richmond}with its {Castle}and{museums.}Gilling is in a good position for going to places such as{Bowes Museum}and {Raby Castle.
